topics.body:
So theres this Baby lizard that lives in my shower now for some reason and I keep having to take him out but he keeps coming back sooo. :I

I named him Simon Belmont.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fe35df6368726e8d320100#post_53fe35df6368726e8d320100
I always wanted a pet iguana but my mom didn't like them and my even now building doesn't allow reptiles.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
So, a friend of my brother give him a puppy and my dad doesn't even know. And he said "no, I don't want any animal here!". My mom just saw the puppy and put a face of "son, you are in big trouble..." and I just laughted.

!http://s28.postimg.org/cn5e3g2ek/20140827_144419.jpg!
 
[spoiler]Sorry, the photo appeared like that.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fe3629636872585e820100#post_53fe3629636872585e820100
Same, In fact when I was a kid some guy next door to our house knocked on our door and _literally_ was asking if we wanted a free Iguana because he didn't want his.

Sadly my mom said no. :/

Speaking of Repiles, they are my favorite!

If you play your cards right, he might let you kep her, provided of course, you 2 are fully in charge and he doesn't have to do anything. You can probably convince him that any expense (Veterinary, food, etc.) can be covered by you an your brother.
